statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ -22 \\ 17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -10 \\ 0 \\ -38 \\ 31 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
